senses.sense_definition: A character in the deuterocanonical Book of Judith, described as an invading general of Nebuchadnezzar who was beheaded by Judith.

examples.text: The dramatic scene of Judith and <w>Holofernes</w> is a popular subject in Baroque art.
In the ancient narrative, <w>Holofernes</w> commands a massive army against the Israelites before his defeat.
